text: 7.46 1 Sml 16.1, 2 Sml 7.1-16, 1 Kin 8.19, 1 Sto 17.1-14, Sng 89.19, 132.1-5 God Depid nop nɨgek tep gak, Depid ne God nop agnɨŋɨd agak, Yad kal tep olap gen, chɨn Jekop7.46 Bɨ Jekop, yɨb ne olap Yislel agelɨgɨpal. Ne Yislel binɨb based kɨli yolɨgup. ñapay ne okok apɨl, kal anɨb ak mɨgan ayaŋ nep gos nɨŋɨd agnɨgɨnɨgun akaŋ agak?
